articles.author: Tom Wildie
articles.title: Cricket Australia insists Justin Langer is the right person to lead Australia, but won't decide his future until after the summer
articles.description: Cricket Australia insists Justin Langer is the right person to lead the men's national team this summer, but won't commit to re-signing him before the end of the Ashes series.
articles.content:
Cricket Australia (CA) insists Justin Langer is the right person to lead the men's national team this summer, but will not commit to re-signing him before the end of the Ashes series next year.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
